players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice, I investigated you and found you are the mafia. Vote to arrest you."
You: "I was at the library, can't know who did it. I think Charlie might be the mafia."
Charlie: "Alice, Bob died, you likely did it. Diana, your investigation convinces me. I support your vote."
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "Diana, I trust your investigation. Alice, you are innocent. Vote for Bob, the mafia."
Diana: "Alice, you are mafia. Bob died, not you. Charlie, you are the only villager left. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
